author: Predeactor
description: A collection of cogs created by a certain 'Capitaine'. Including games and moderations tools.
short: Set of multiple cogs with different functionalities, from games to moderation.
install_msg:
:star: __Thank for adding my repository to your bot__! I hope you will enjoy my cog as much as I created them!

**:gear: Support & Bugs**
- Did you find something wrong? Feel free to open an issue on my repository, at <https://github.com/Predeactor/Predeactor-Cogs>.
- If you need support, you can go to my support server: <https://discord.gg/zg6ydua>.

**:coin: Support me and my work**If you wish to support my work, I have different options that will please you in any way.
	| :coffee: <https://ko-fi.com/predeactor> - Ko-Fi, where you only pay 2 dollars or more if you wish.
	| :bank: https://paypal.me/predeactor - PayPal, to directly support me.
	| :rocket: <https://www.patreon.com/predeactor> - Patreon, so I can get money every months!

*Thank for using my cogs.*
